wines.productName: Well Crafted Vin de France Organic Rose Keg NV (2000 ml)
wines.description: This organic French rosé in keg format (2000ml) offers sustainable, eco-friendly packaging with fresh, vibrant character. The wine showcases French rosé tradition with certified organic grapes. A versatile, party-ready rosé perfect for gatherings.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose presents fresh aromas of strawberry, raspberry, and citrus, with light floral notes. The organic viticulture provides clean, pure fruit expression.
tastingNotes.palate: Light to medium-bodied with crisp acidity and bright fruit flavors. Flavors of red berries and citrus create a refreshing, easy-drinking profile.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is clean and short with lingering berry notes. Refreshing acidity provides balance.

wineDetails.style: Fresh, organic French rosé in keg format
wineDetails.ageability: Best enjoyed fresh; drink within months of purchase

wines.description: This Chardonnay from Baleia offers balanced fruit with modern winemaking techniques. The wine showcases quality Chardonnay character with accessibility. A well-crafted white wine with broad appeal.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals aromas of apple, pear, and citrus, with subtle oak notes of vanilla and butter. Light tropical hints add complexity.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with creamy texture and balanced acidity. Flavors of apple, citrus, and stone fruit are complemented by vanilla and toast notes.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is clean and moderately long with lingering fruit and oak notes.

wines.productName: Boxwood Trellis Red King Street Oyster (Private Label) 2022
wines.description: This private label red blend from Boxwood showcases Virginia winemaking with Bordeaux-style blending. The wine offers structure and complexity suitable for fine dining. A distinctive Virginia red with regional character.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose presents aromas of blackberry, cherry, and plum, with notes of cedar, tobacco, and herbs. Oak influences add vanilla and spice.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium to full-bodied with structured tannins and balanced acidity. Flavors of dark fruit are complemented by savory oak and earth notes.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is moderately long with persistent fruit and oak notes. Firm tannins provide structure.

wineDetails.grapeVariety: Bordeaux-style blend (likely Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Cabernet Franc)

wines.description: This Rioja Crianza from Viña Albina showcases traditional Spanish winemaking with oak aging. The wine offers classic Rioja character with balance and food-friendliness. A reliable expression of Spanish red wine.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals aromas of red cherry, plum, and vanilla, with notes of leather, tobacco, and cedar from oak aging.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with soft tannins and balanced acidity. Flavors of red fruit are complemented by oak-derived vanilla and spice notes.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is moderately long with persistent fruit and oak notes.

wines.productName: Crimson Clover Sauvignon Blanc Keg 2024 (20000 ml)
wines.description: This large-format keg Sauvignon Blanc offers fresh, vibrant character perfect for high-volume service. The wine showcases classic Sauvignon Blanc aromatics with crisp acidity. An eco-friendly packaging solution for restaurants and events.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose presents bright aromas of grapefruit, lime, and fresh herbs, with notes of passion fruit and grass.
tastingNotes.palate: Light to medium-bodied with zesty acidity and clean fruit flavors. Notes of citrus and tropical fruit dominate.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is clean and refreshing with persistent citrus notes.

wineDetails.style: Fresh, crisp Sauvignon Blanc in keg format

wines.description: This Paso Robles Sauvignon Blanc from Castoro Cellars offers bright fruit with refreshing acidity. The wine showcases California's approachable style with clean flavors. A versatile white wine for everyday enjoyment.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose presents aromas of grapefruit, lime, and tropical fruit, with hints of fresh herbs and minerality.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with crisp acidity and clean fruit flavors. Notes of citrus, melon, and subtle tropical fruit create a refreshing profile.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is clean and moderately long with lingering citrus notes.

wines.description: This classic Sancerre from Carlin Pinson showcases Loire Valley Sauvignon Blanc with limestone-driven minerality. The wine offers crisp acidity and refined fruit character. An elegant French white wine with terroir expression.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals aromas of citrus, green apple, and white flowers, with pronounced mineral notes of flint and chalk.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with electric acidity and intense minerality. Flavors of lemon, lime, and grapefruit dominate with a distinct saline quality.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is long and mineral-driven with persistent citrus notes.

wines.productName: Collina San Ponzio Barbera D Alba 2024
wines.description: This fresh Barbera from Piedmont showcases the variety's bright acidity and cherry fruit character. The 2024 vintage is youthful and vibrant. An approachable Italian red perfect for everyday drinking.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose presents bright aromas of red cherry, raspberry, and plum, with hints of violet and spice.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with high acidity and juicy fruit flavors. Notes of cherry and red berries dominate with refreshing character.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is clean and moderately long with persistent fruit and a hint of pleasant acidity.

wines.description: This prestigious Châteauneuf-du-Pape showcases the southern Rhône's signature Grenache-based blend with power and complexity. The 2020 vintage offers excellent quality. A distinguished French red wine with aging potential.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose reveals complex aromas of dark cherry, raspberry, and garrigue herbs, with notes of leather, spice, and earth.
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with concentrated fruit and firm tannins. Flavors of dark berries, herbs, and spice dominate with excellent depth and complexity.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is very long with persistent fruit, spice, and earthy notes.

wineDetails.grapeVariety: Grenache-based blend with Syrah, Mourvèdre, and others

wines.productName: Sun Break Nicolette White Pinot Noir 2023
wines.description: This white Pinot Noir from Sun Break offers a rare expression of the variety vinified as white wine. The wine showcases delicate aromatics with fresh acidity. An intriguing, artisanal white wine with distinctive character.

tastingNotes.aroma: The nose presents delicate aromas of white flowers, citrus, and stone fruit, with subtle red berry hints from the Pinot Noir skins.
tastingNotes.palate: Light to medium-bodied with crisp acidity and clean fruit flavors. Notes of citrus, apple, and subtle berry create an elegant profile.
tastingNotes.finish: The finish is clean and refreshing with lingering floral and fruit notes.

wineDetails.style: Rare white Pinot Noir with delicate character
